Headline: User Research Leader | Product Strategy | Healthcare Innovation
Summary: I lead user research at Included Health, where I shape product strategy by connecting member insights to business outcomes.At Included Health, I've led discovery for our first new product in 3 years (achieving 5/5 member satisfaction), transformed research operations to deliver 4x the volume at 54% lower cost, and defined multi-year strategies for flagship products that address $40M+ opportunities. My work spans strategic product innovation, operational excellence, and cross-functional leadership across clinical, product, and design teams.Before Included Health, I co-founded Gobee Group, a global design consultancy focused on human-centered innovation in healthcare and social impact. Over 13 years, we developed medical devices, data-driven health products, and technology solutions across 25+ countries, working with organizations including Microsoft, UNICEF, the World Bank, and the Clinton Health Access Initiative.PhD from UC Berkeley.
